Razor Claw took advantage of the open door and used the old tuck and roll t=
echnique to escape damage. He turned back toward Wolveritron, Eclipse and R=
amus and started to run toward them. He continued his concentration on the =
smallest of the three. (Wolveritron)

"Do you still insist on letting other=
s fight your sentence?" he yells trying to provoke his prey.

(If Wolveritr=
on is based on a certain mutant then you know that he would never settle fo=
r being called a coward.)

  From: dachande =

=
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  ::Optimus Prime::
   
      He =
opened a door. But kept going, just slowed down to about 25 mph. "You can l=
eave at anytime. But I am Optimus Prime."

    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, =
February 08, 2001 10:52 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    =
Razor Claw kept struggling whipping his tail and slashing his claws doing a=

    nasty number on the upholstry. he knew that transformers could regener=
ate
    and did his best to keep it from happening.

    Optimus Prime was =
a great leader who left a legend for us. None of the
    legends events hav=
e happened yet so you are nothing more than a cheap copy."
    "The enraged=
 raptor bit down hard on the steering wheel pulling on it
    intending to =
rip it out. "Now release me and let me go back to my business
    with the =
deserters."

    (I was thinking that Razor Claw would be about the same si=
ze as Dinobot
    since #1- he is cloned from Dinobots DNA and #2 the Mutan=
t toys about the
    same size as Dinobots figure.)

age -----

iked that window," Prime said. If the raptor
